summary: Defines a virtual root object that aggregates all submodules of a Git repository, allowing collective traversal, inspection, and bulk management of the submodule hierarchy. Includes a specialized progress tracker that extends generic update progress with operation codes for actions such as adding, removing, changing branches, paths, or URLs of submodules.
business_intent: Enable tools and scripts to handle complex repositories with many submodules through a single entry point, simplifying bulk updates, synchronization, and status reporting across the entire submodule tree.
